channel.title: Opportunities | Academic CV Pro Hugo Theme

item.description:
Openings

We are always looking for talented, curious, and highly-motivated students and postdocs to join us! This is a great opportunities for young scholars to join one of the most exciting research fields that could potentially change our lives.

Postdoctoral scholars

Position available. The position is set to start as soon as fall 2024. We seek outstanding individuals with strong demonstrated skills in at least one of the following fields:

  • Experimental quantum science and engineering
  • Acoustics/MEMS
  • Nanofabrication

Applicants should submit a CV, a brief statement of research interests and goals, and contact information of at least two references. Please send these materials to chenmo AT caltech DOT edu

Graduate students

We are always looking for motivated PhD students from MSE, ECE, Physics, MechE, Applied Physics, and other relevant fields.

Prospective PhD students are encouraged to reach out to Prof. Chen with your CV and a brief statement of your research interests and goals.

Current UW PhD students interested in our lab are encouraged to contact Prof. Chen with your CV and a brief statement of your research interests and goals.

Undergraduate researchers

We enthusiastically promote undergraduate research through summer projects and/or independent research. Please reach out to Prof. Chen with your CV and a brief description of your research interests.

Contact

Mo Chen, Assistant Professor of MSE

chenmo AT caltech DOT edu

(xxx)-xxx-xxxx

Office:

Visiting

Our offices are located in the Roberts Hall (ROB) on the beautiful campus of University of Washington. Our lab is next door in Roberts Hall.
